data.title: Thai wheelchair- racing athlete explains ban for anti-doping violation
data.description: Prawat Wahoram says he never used banned substances, and ban resulted from missing tests through oversight

data.title: Relaxation and Rejuvenation The Salil Hotel Riverside
data.description: The Salil Hotel Riverside – Bangkok offers more than just riverside accommodations; it provides an experience rooted in the "Journey of Dreams" concept, elevating hospitality through six essential components: Stay, Taste, Relax, Shop, Socialize, and Work.

data.title: Sin at new heights
data.description: Avani+ Riverside Bangkok Hotel will open Sin, Bangkok

data.title: Bangkokians urged to mask up as PM2.5 levels hit dangerous zones
data.description: Air pollution rises beyond safe limits in several districts of the capital, prompting the Bangkok Metropolitan Administration to issue a warning

data.title: 2 key Bangkok motorways to be toll-free during New Year holidays
data.description: Toll waiver on Bangkok-Chonburi-Pattaya and outer ring road to  be effective from December 26 to January 2 in a bid to ease congestion

data.title: Four foreigners arrested over 8m crypto heist in Phuket
data.description: Quartet charged with tying up Ukrainian in hotel room and forcing him to hand over millions in Tether digital tokens

data.title: Bad vibes: Feng shui master arrested for alleged 86m fraud
data.description: Police nab Bangkok’s ‘Master Od’ after customers complain he deceived them by posing as 15th-generation Chinese geomancer

data.title: Nineteen medal haul for Thai athletes in the Maldives
data.description: Thailand claims overall third place at the World Bodybuilding and Fitness Championships with 5 gold, 7 silver, and 7 bronze medals

data.title: Number of Americans looking to move abroad soars: poll
data.description: Thailand among the 25 preferred destinations for disillusioned Americans wanting to resettle following Trump victory

data.title: Forestry protection officers attacked, valuable rosewood logs stolen
data.description: The gang, who also disabled CCTV cameras in the area, are thought to be familiar with the area of forest in which the attack took place

data.title: PM heads to Los Angeles and Lima for a week of meetings
data.description: Thai delegation combines participation at APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting in Peruvian capital an official visit to Los Angeles

data.title: Myanmar meets less than 50% of power demand amid fuel and line disruptions
data.description: The Ministry of Electric Power has stated that only around 50% of the electricity demand can currently be generated and distributed due to the destruction of power lines, a decrease in electricity generation from natural gas plants, and ongoing maintenance efforts caused by flooding.

data.title: Myanmar meets less than 50% of power demand amid fuel and line disruptions
data.description: The Ministry of Electric Power has stated that only around 50% of the electricity demand can currently be generated and distributed due to the destruction of power lines, a decrease in electricity generation from natural gas plants, and ongoing maintenance efforts caused by flooding.

data.title: Pilot programme allowing Vietnamese to gamble in casinos extended
data.description: The Vietnamese government is extending the pilot programme to allow Vietnamese to gamble in casinos.

data.title: From birdwatching to advocacy
data.description: Katanyou Wuttichaitanakorn

data.title: EV and straight-six options
data.description: The BMW M3 will return for a seventh generation with the choice of either a straight-six turbo petrol engine or a high-tech EV powertrain with huge power and unprecedented dynamic ability.

data.title: Suzuki enters EV fray with Aceman rival
data.description: Suzuki has finally unveiled its first electric car, the eVitara, becoming one of the last major car makers to enter the EV market.

data.title: Conference to explore future of AI
data.description: The Open AGI Summit, a pioneering conference exploring the intersection of artificial general intelligence and decentralised technologies, will take place at SCB Next Tech, 4th floor of Siam Paragon, Rama I Road, on Thursday from 10am to 8pm.

data.title: World Film Series ends with Romanian movie
data.description: The 2024 Contemporary World Film Series will conclude with the screening of 6.9 On The Richter Scale, at TK Park

data.title: Generational politics
data.description: Political conflicts around the world typically arise from divisions based on class, ethnicity, rural-urban disparities and caste, rather than age differences. This observation caused Asst Prof Kanokrat Lertchoosakul, lecturer at the Faculty of Political Science, Chulalongkorn University, to investigate if it is true that political conflict in Thailand is one between generations.

data.title: Music legend Quincy Jones dies at 91
data.description: Quincy Jones, the legendary record producer, composer, and arranger whose transformative influence on American music spanned more than seven decades, has passed away at 91. His publicist, Arnold Robinson, confirmed that Jones died peacefully at his Bel Air home due to complications from pneumonia.

data.title: Thai badminton star wins Korea Masters
data.description: Thailand's top badminton star Kunlavut Vitidsarn powers to his first title of 2024

data.title: Suvarnabhumi urges against releasing objects into sky on Loy Krathong
data.description: Public asked to refrain from releasing sky lanterns, fireworks, balloons and lasers near Suvarnabhumi Airport during festival

data.title: Tourists flock to watch sunset alignment at Phimai Historical Park in Korat
data.description: Sunday was last day of five-day period to enjoy architectural alignment of temple complex with setting sun
